company_name: BENZ-BEREGNUNG GESELLSCHAFT FÜR BEREGNUNGS- UND WASSERTECHNIK MBH
supplier_of: gardening and horticulture - machinery and equipment | agriculture and forestry - machinery and equipment | irrigation and sprinkling systems | sprinkler systems | livestock raising - machinery and equipment
information: The company BENZ-BEREGNUNG GESELLSCHAFT FÜR BEREGNUNGS- UND WASSERTECHNIK MBH, is a Manufacturer/ Producer, founded in 1978, which operates in the Irrigation and sprinkling systems industry. It also operates in the Sprinkler systems, Agriculture and forestry - machinery and equipment, Gardening and horticulture - machinery and equipment, and Livestock raising - machinery and equipment industries. It is based in Göllheim, Germany.
